name: Path of Ancestry
description:
Initially created for the Global Game Jam 2023, and expanded upon shortly after, Path of Ancestry is a card-battling rogue-like set in a strange, subterranean world.

Three rival clans send their warriors down the Path of Ancestry in hopes of learning its secrets. Will you be the first to make it to the Path's end, and uncover the answers erased by time?

Battle Controls:

Left click to select a card

Credits:

Travis - Programmer, Designer

August - Sound, Programmer, Designer

Conner - Producer, Designer, Programmer

James - Artist
